title: Why did this call for a perma ban

replies.body:
1.) That was only one of the chat logs given in your reform card. Other games were given (and considered). You should post those here too instead of just hand picking. Your punishment was not based on a single game.

2.) This is your fourth punishment. You perma-ban was caused by being punished so soon after your 14-day ban. There is an escalation schedule in place so if you don't show reform each punishment is more severe than the previous. You did not show reform, so any punishment (even a chat restriction) would result in a perma-ban for your account.
even a chat restriction?? dude I get chatblocked every 20 seconds on a good game, sometimes I get chatblocked just for joining champ select.
Yeah, anything that gets you a Chat Restriction will get you Permabanned if you keep it up.
but I just get them at random. and then it will go away after like 10-15 seconds.

You've never had a chat restriction, which is why you are probably not understanding it.

Chat restrictions are a punishment given that last a number of games.

The player is given a limited number of times they can chat (5) and regain another chat message over a period of time.
You'll have to take a screenshot of what you're getting then, because Chat Restrictions last for several *games*, not seconds.
I'll try to screencap it next time.

Telling people to report others is counted as harassment, which is punishable.

You asked for reports in chat.

I assume you already had a 14 day ban. Your next punishment, regardless of what triggers it, is a perma ban. So now you are permaed. Bye.

It's harassment, and annoying to everyone around you. Just report him yourself and move on. I'd suggest on your new account you don't turn All chat on, and you don't use chat at all.
